Reproducible Reporting with {gtsummary}

Author

Daniel D. Sjoberg 

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, results = 'asis')
library(gtsummary)
library(tidyverse)
── Attaching packages ─────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.3.1 ──
✔ ggplot2 3.3.6     ✔ purrr   0.3.4
✔ tibble  3.1.7     ✔ dplyr   1.0.9

✖ dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter()
✖ dplyr::lag()    masks stats::lag()
knit_print.gtsummary <- function(x, ...) {
  gtsummary::as_gt(x) |> gt::as_raw_html()
}

registerS3method("knit_print", "gtsummary", knit_print.gtsummary)
# fill for font awesome icons
fa_fill <- "#C7B41D"

{gtsummary} {tidyverse}
install.packages(c("gtsummary", "tidyverse"))

Show a tbl

trial |> 
  tbl_summary(
    by = trt, 
    include = c(age, grade)
  )
Characteristic Drug A, N = 981 Drug B, N = 1021
Age 46 (37, 59) 48 (39, 56)
Unknown 7 4
